about_the_game:
Basic Weapon Set that holds the immense power of the King Dragon. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.

Included Items:
- King Dragon Great Sword
- King Dragon Longbow
- King Dragon Staff
- King Dragon Gauntlet
detailed_description:
Basic Weapon Set that holds the immense power of the King Dragon. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.

Included Items:
- King Dragon Great Sword
- King Dragon Longbow
- King Dragon Staff
- King Dragon Gauntlet

name: KurtzPel - King Dragon Basic Weapon Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

short_description: Basic Weapon Set that holds the immense power of the King Dragon. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma. Included Items: - King Dragon Great Sword - King Dragon Longbow - King Dragon Staff - King Dragon Gauntlet
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Thai, Polish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
